articles.title: Masked Singer's Croissants Revealed: Controversial Reality Couple Talks Politics, Prison, And Being 'Misunderstood' - TVLine
articles.description: Fresh off their elimination from The Masked Singer, the Croissants open up to TVLine about leaning into their controversial past: "Let's cut the bulls**t."

articles.title: Actor Timothy Busfield ordered held without bond in New Mexico child sex abuse case - AP News
articles.description: Actor Timothy Busfield was ordered held without bond at his first New Mexico court appearance on child sex abuse charges, pending a detention hearing in coming days. Wednesday's hearing took place a day after Busfield turned himself on an arrest warrant and c…

articles.title: Fans are freaking out over the height requirement for Bad Bunny Super Bowl halftime show - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: Those who want to participate in the Super Bowl halftime show have to be between 5-feet, 7 inches and 6 feet tall, according to the field team application.

articles.title: Disney Will Bring the Original Star Wars Trilogy to Disneyland in Theme Park Pivot - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The company launched Galaxy's Edge at Disneyland in 2019, set in the timeline of its sequels, but will bring Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker and John Williams' iconic score to the land this spring.

articles.title: The Fantastic Four’s History with Black Panther and Wakanda, Explained - Marvel.com
articles.description: Did you know that Black Panther and Wakanda first appeared in 'Fantastic Four' (1961) #52? Learn all about it and more here!

articles.title: ‘Stranger Things’ brings Prince and Fleetwood Mac back to the charts - NPR
articles.description: Netflix's Stranger Things finale, which dropped Dec. 31, is shaking up the Billboard Hot 100.

articles.title: Kiefer Sutherland arrested and accused of assaulting ride-share driver, L.A. police say - NBC News
articles.description: Actor Kiefer Sutherland, a film and television star since the 1980s, was arrested Monday after he was alleged to have physically assaulted and threatened a ride-share driver, police said.

articles.title: ‘God of War’ Live-Action Series Casts Ryan Hurst as Kratos - Variety
articles.description: Ryan Hurst will play Kratos in the upcoming "God of War" live-action series at Amazon Prime Video.

articles.title: Austin movie buffs say Alamo Drafthouse's new mobile ordering policy has lost the plot - KUT
articles.description: Starting mid-February, Alamo Drafthouse will ditch its pen and paper ordering system for food and drinks.

articles.title: Grammy-nominated musician John Forté found dead at 50 in Massachusetts home - NBC News
articles.description: John Forté, the Grammy-nominated musician known for his work with the Fugees and the Refugee Camp All-Stars among others, has died at age 50.

articles.title: Scott Adams’ Life and Death Is a Cautionary Tale for the MAGA Age - Slate
articles.description: While generations of fans may have loved “Dilbert,” its creator devolved into something unrecognizable as he embraced the MAGA age.

articles.title: Julio Iglesias accused of sexual assault in Caribbean as Spanish prosecutors study allegations - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: Spanish prosecutors are studying allegations that Grammy-winning singer Julio Iglesias sexually assaulted two former employees.
